title: Amuse Bouche
description: In the opening chapters of The Winemaker's Dinner: Appetizers by Dr. Ivan Rusilko and Everly Drummond, sparks flew for Jaden Thorne the minute her eyes landed on a handsome stranger across the dance floor. Dr. Ivan Rusilko tells his side of the story about that magical night in the short companion novella, The Winemaker's Dinner: Amuse Bouche, tempting readers with his own raw and uninhibited, and undeniably charming, Ivan perspective. Fall in love all over again with the young lovers in this sexy retelling of the night it all began. Bonus material includes the first chapter of the first book in The Winemaker's Feast Trilogy, The Winemaker's Dinner: Appetizers.
author: Ivan Rusilko
